author: 99designs Team
title: Announcing the winners of the 2017 99awards!
text:
Owtee-TheDreamer. Mar 9 2017 
A lot of amazing works displayed. The “Most out-there design” and “Best line art design” were my favorite categories. 
Good luck to all the great designers chosen. You all deserve to win! Sasa Mar 9 2017 
Very creative and Dusan goosebumps. Dusan has a successful career and every day progresses .. I watched his other works, were fantastic. He has won many awards, and in our country and its logo are all over the world. from america, europe russia Australian, coffee drinks, butchers, health food store media investments .etc See for yourself. worked my friends the whole preparation for the new company. and they are very happy it is not necessary to talk further, look at his portfolio and you will be assured of quality. thank you Sasha
